entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json: Add option to write trailing commas on serialization. #79793
  • [API Proposal]: Publicly expose `IPartition<TElement>` #79791
  • [API Proposal]: `[LibraryExport]` analogous to `[JSExport]` #79786
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Integrate Reactive's System.Linq.Async APIs into the Base Class Libraries #79782
  • [API Proposal]: Provide optimized read-only collections for SortedSet and SortedDictionary #79781
  • [API Proposal]: Adding ToSortedSet and ToSortedDictionary extension methods to the Enumerable class #79780

Closed

  • DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in Arm64 Docker Image #79282
    8.0.0
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Options when IOptionsMonitor<T> created concurrently #79529
    8.0.0
  • IServiceProvider.GetService throw exception “Ambiguous match found.” #79739
  • RegEx: Possible bug in Regex when matching words located right after an emoticon #79792
  • CHF and CAD not resolved properly in EFIGS #79789
    8.0.0
  • JIT: invalid flags handling by fgMorphStoreDynBlock #79750
    8.0.0
  • Fix the disabled tests in the System V struct passing tests when Issue #2075 is resolved #4680
    Future
  • Performance regression - Allocation/WorkingSet on PlaintextPlatform #79774
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in MultipartContent #79788
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CompareInfo.Icu.cs #79787
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Remove manual DLL copy from ILCompiler build task #79783
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix condition for selecting build pools for official builds #79779
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add instructions for disabling VS signature validation #79777
    documentation, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Create live publishing workflow #79775
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do less work when resolving members of types #79784
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed relative links in Memory-model.md #79785
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable a few outerloop tests and update issue numbers #79759
  • JIT: Fix indir flags propagation for a couple of cases #79751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix switch peeling flags propagation #79748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up some old style walks and QMARK validation #79747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some commented tests #79742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid boxing in DeferredDisposableLifetime #79778
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on Windows arm64 fails #2121
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2120
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: assert in ssabuilder #2117

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix NAOT runtime libraries VS experience for WASM #2132
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge from runtime/main #2131
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add `LLVM_CMAKE_CONFIG_DEBUG` and `LLVM_CMAKE_CONFIG_RELEASE` #2130
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix local libraries build #2129

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: revert change that caused the Ilc exit status to be lost #2124
  • Disable Build and run libraries tests for official builds #2128
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Build wasm packages for official builds #2127
  • Attempt to fix package publishing #2126

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1109 \ #29600

PullRequests

Updated

  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error message for a struct member used as default parameter value #66049
  • IntelliSense and analyzers node are *completely* broken with legacy style .csproj projects and manual Roslyn multi-targeting #66047
  • Implicit field initialization analysis is firing an Assert #66046
  • Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig not respect .EditorConfig settings - unable to use #66045
  • Removed analyzers still show up in solution explorer (legacy .csproj) #66044

PullRequests

Created

  • Keep the block of else-if statement in "Use null propogation" codefix #66048
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Suppress semantic diagnostics from being reported by pull-diag-taggers until the project has fully loaded. #66034
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #66050
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Only examine a PEReference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #45651
  • Support DateTimeOffset as parsing options for [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #45650
  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution fails if user has group with comma in name #45648
  • Blazor change detection improvment #45644
  • Please reopen https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/45182#issue-1456298401 #45643
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #45641
  • Documentation comments Typo in Twitter Authentication Extensions file #45640

Closed

  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc #45485
  • Blazor doesn't render components inside `template` tags #45605

PullRequests

Created

  • Add rate limiter context HttpContext feature #45652
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Fix documentation comments typo in Twitter authentication. #45647
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Fixing the problems with ProblemDetails #45646
    area-web-frameworks
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert "Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22616.4" #45639
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2069431 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QueryProperty is not set when navigating back to page. #12190
  • Flexlayout into CollectionView crashes #12189
  • UICollectionView is stuck in its update/layout loop #12188
  • .NET Maui first Hello World for .Net 7.0 Windows target fails #12186
  • Images are not rendering in both iOS and Android #12184

Closed

  • Frame style in App class ignored #7560
  • Request SecureStorage to store large Text #12187
  • Hot Reload for .NET maui #12047

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Azure Function and Entity Framework Sql Server error - Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions, Version=7.0.0.0 #29883
  • Many to many entity add faild #29882
  • Validate that only a single service property of a given type is added per entity type #29881
  • Migration file is generated with same content #29879
  • Auto project columns based on `AsQueryable<T>` and `AsEnumerable<T>` generic type #29878

Closed

  • Upgrade to EFCore 7 Results in Unexpected Index Changes #29880

PullRequests

Merged

  • Most of explicit and lazy loading for no-tracking queries #29865

Updated

  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876
